name: The Worm's Holes
description:
In this short game, you're a worm. You must dig wormholes to get revenge on the humans that took your food. 

[SPACE] - Dig

[R] - Restart

WASD or ARROW KEYS to move.

//HELP

If you get stuck in level3 , I'll let you know you can climb up the cobwebs by spamming [PERISCOPE] and left arrow.

Music used:

Dead Forest & Ending: 60 minutes of Woodland Ambiance (Nature Sounds Series #4) Trickling Stream & Birds Sounds - YouTube

The Upside Down: Stranger Things ost: The Upside Down extended (Zero's edit) - YouTube

Green Mountains: Mountain Roads | Orchestral Deep Atmospheric Ambient Music | ASKII Symphonic - YouTube

Hell: Hell Choirs - Dark ambient music : electronic music and real choir sounds - YouTube

Snowy Mountains: SNOWY MOUNTAIN SOUNDS 🎧 Studying | Relaxing | Sleeping (SKYRIM Ambience | ASMR) - YouTube

Every other sound is also from https://freesound.org/home , with a little bit of editing.

Background Images (Trees, Mountains and flames) from Google Images.

Every other sprite was made in paint.net

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.1 ~ Holes
